name: Monsters Inc.: Scream Arena
overview: The monsters of Monstropolis have learned the power of laughter, but now they need to practice making kids laugh. Monsters, Inc. Scream Arena trains you to inspire laughter in seven arenas. As one of your favorite Monsters, Inc. characters, you must throw, dodge, and block your way to victory. In single-player or multi-player modes, the winner is the first monster to knock your opponents silly. While you gain more and more laughter to power Monstropolis, you'll unlock hidden characters, bonus stages, and mini-games.
